purpose: LUT School of Engineering Sciences is announcing a job opening for a Professor in Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering. The position is available at the Department of Software Engineering, which focuses on software development, digital transformation, and user-centered design. The professorship can be at the assistant, associate, or full professor levels and is for a fixed term of four years or permanently. Candidates should have research expertise in AI related to software engineering, with specific areas of focus outlined. The role includes responsibilities in education, research, and administrative tasks. The application deadline is 11 August 2025.
